name: The Fungal Frontier
description:
Beneath the bark lies a battleground! In "The Fungal Frontier," grow your roots deep, fortify with fungal turrets, and fend off the beetle horde. 

Click on a root node to open the build menu 

Click and drag from the build menu to create roots and root node 

Create root nodes ontop of water pockets to get extra water. 

Protect your roots as you descend to the giant water pocket!

This game was built of global game jam 2023.
